name: nativescript-toast
description: A NativeScript Toast Plugin for Android and iOS apps.

scripts.clean: git checkout samples/angular/package.json && rm -rf node_modules target tmp && mkdir tmp && cd samples/angular && rm -rf node_modules hooks platforms
scripts.test: cd tmp && tns create my-test-app --ng && cd my-test-app && rm -rf platforms node_modules hooks && tns plugin add ../.. && tns install && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.pre-e2e: cd samples/angular && tns install && tns platform add ios && tns platform add android && tns build ios && tns build android

author: Tobias Hennig <tobias.hennig1@gmail.com> (https://github.com/TobiasHennig)
